body:
this import should probably go somewhere else, right (there's nothing in this file that depends on Python.h)?

Also, since we've removed some THP prefixes from the name, I'm sort of confused about when something is python specific and not (and we probably want to keep these separate, e.g. we've had problems like https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/1795 before CC @ezyang).  I could see myself using these functions for convenience in some non-python specific code and being surprised at getting ValueErrors and such.  What's the story here?
